org.numenta.nupic.encoders

Class DateEncoder.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.encoders.Encoder.Builder<DateEncoder.Builder,DateEncoder>
      • org.numenta.nupic.encoders.DateEncoder.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DateEncoder

    public static class DateEncoder.Builder
extends Encoder.Builder<DateEncoder.Builder,DateEncoder>
    Returns a Encoder.Builder for constructing DateEncoders The base class architecture is put together in such a way where boilerplate initialization can be kept to a minimum for implementing subclasses. Hopefully! :-)
    See Also:
    ScalarEncoder.Builder#setStuff(int)
